##### Installing tensorflow-gpu for windows
# conda install -c conda-forge cudatoolkit=11.2 cudnn=8.1.0
## Anything above 2.10 is not supported on the GPU on Windows Native
# python -m pip install "tensorflow<2.11"
## Verify install:
# python -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.config.list_physical_devices('GPU'))"

##### For jupyter-git extension
# pip install --upgrade jupyterlab jupyterlab-git


##### Packages
jupyterlab==3 # IDE
jupyterlab-git==0.30 # Jupyter Lab Git extension
wfdb # WaveForm-Database package. A library of tools for reading, writing, and processing WFDB signals and annotations.
tqdm # Progress bar
